shrines.name: Charge Shrine
shrines.description: Offers permanent stat upgrades in exchange for gold.
shrines.strategy: Prioritize damage or crit chance for most builds.
shrines.notes: Always worth visiting if you have gold to spare.

shrines.name: Challenge Shrine
shrines.description: Spawns a wave of enemies for bonus rewards.
shrines.strategy: Only attempt if your build can handle the wave.

shrines.name: Gamble Shrine
shrines.description: Risk gold for chance at rare items.
shrines.strategy: Worth the gamble early game, risky late game.
shrines.notes: Can give legendary items if you're lucky.
